metadata.synopsis: Theodore Thistlewhistle, a halfling friend of Jaheira's, is moping about her now empty house - Mostly there to tell players why the house is mostly empty. His ADs are just idles and only really serve to have him musing to himself.

0.speaker: 21783519-4c61-4e36-abd4-c9386303cade
0.text: Shutters secured, sanctuary sealed. All I can do for now.

1.speaker: 21783519-4c61-4e36-abd4-c9386303cade
1.text: I'll leave out some oats for that badger. Might improve it's bloody mood if it comes back.

2.speaker: 21783519-4c61-4e36-abd4-c9386303cade
2.text: Tending the house, I can handle. Plants - you're on your own.
2.context: NodeContext: Washing his hands of keeping the plants alive.

3.speaker: 21783519-4c61-4e36-abd4-c9386303cade
3.text: Don't worry, High Harper. This place will still be here if Rion comes back. When.
3.context: NodeContext: Musing - catching himself doubting and doubling down on the 'when'
